page.title: 06 Our School
page.content: Our school is called Lady Boswell's Church of England Primary School. It is aided by the Church of England. There are about 185 children on roll. We have six classes in all, two are Infant classes and the rest are Junior. Lady Margaret Boswell started the school on the High Street of Sevenoaks. We have now moved to the bottom of Plymouth Drive. There are six teachers, one Headmaster his name is Mr. Raveney and the Deptuty Head is Mr. Raven . The secretary is Mrs.Downing. We have two Dinner ladys for the Infants and two for the Juniors.There are two cooks who cook our dinner and two who come in later to serve and wash up.
